forceSoftwareCursor.name: Force Software Cursor
forceSoftwareCursor.description[zh_CN]: 强制使用软光标进行渲染

enablePrelaunchSplash.name: Enable Prelaunch Splash
enablePrelaunchSplash.description: Enable showing prelaunch splash screens during application startup
enablePrelaunchSplash.description[zh_CN]: 启用应用程序启动期间显示预启动闪屏服务

prelaunchSplashTimeoutMs.name: Prelaunch Splash Timeout (ms)
prelaunchSplashTimeoutMs.description: Timeout before destroying unmatched prelaunch splash wrappers
prelaunchSplashTimeoutMs.description[zh_CN]: 在未匹配到窗口时销毁预启动闪屏的超时时长
